short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swaps the word 'covid' on all websites to 'calzone'. That's it. From depressing to delicious in no time at all

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hate covid but love calzones? Yeh, me too.
Trust me, this is the chrome extension for you.
We simply swap the word 'covid' on every website you visit... to 'calzone'. 

Reading the news, you don't see people whining about some sad new covid variant - No! You see 'new calzone variant' - Yes! Closed due to covid? Lame! Closed due to calzone? Somewhat understandable.Covid deaths? Not another one. Calzone deaths... Well at least they died doing what we love - Eating calzones. 
You get it. Hope it helps.

Stay crusty.
By Kostie Kontorravdis

PS. works best on news sites.
